DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine phototherapy may adjuvant exercise improve muscular efficiency increase aerobic capacity . We hypothesize phototherapy adjuvant physical exercise may benefit population Diabetes mellitus impairment cardiopulmonary fitness low oxygen uptake peak value ( VO2peak ) exercise test . Two dos test 150J 300J . Additionally , study aim evaluate effect phototherapy previously apply exercise cardiovascular coupling . We hypothesize phototherapy previously apply exercise result increase baroreflex sensitivity ( increase coherence gain decreased phase ) , promote improvement cardiovascular autonomic control cardiovascular couple diabetic subject . Two dos test 150J 300J .
DOC.brief_title: Acute Effect Phototherapy With Light Emitting Diode ( LED ) Muscle Pulmonary Oxygen Consumption Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: overt coronary disease sedentary Clinical diagnosis diabetes mellitus Free diabetes mellitus participate control group autonomic neuropathy Smoking anemia alcoholism disability condition preclude exercise
